title: Expeditious Retreat
content:
Expeditious Retreat Level 1 Transmutation Spell Gain Dash immediately and as a bonus action on each of your turns until this spell ends. Until Long Rest 1 turn Concentration Bonus Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Expeditious Retreat

Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Gain Dash immediately and as a bonus action on each of your turns until this spell ends.

Expeditious Retreat is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Expeditious Retreat is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing dam
